Name: Shamrock (bourbon based)
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Giffard Peppermint Pastille crème de menthe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
Review: Basically a sweet Manhattan with a dash of green créme de menthe.
History: Purloined from David Embury's classic book, 'The Fine Art of Mixing Drinks'.
Nutrition: One serving of Shamrock (bourbon based) contains 252 calories
